entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 29 this morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
